resource_dependency.stockDataAPI: A real-time stock data API providing company profiles, current prices, and metadata.
resource_dependency.autoSuggestEndpoint: An endpoint from the stockDataAPI that returns matching stock suggestions based on partial input strings.

function: Allow users to search for stocks by entering either stock codes or company names.
static_description: A centered search bar with a magnifying glass icon (searchIcon) on a white background. The input field has placeholder text 'Enter stock code or name'. Component color is navy.

interaction_and_states.description: Focuses the search input field when clicked.
Triggers an API call to autoSuggestEndpoint after 300ms debounce. Displays dropdown list of suggested matches below the input.

resource_dependency.autoSuggestListStyle: Dropdown list styled with navy borders and white background, showing up to 5 items.
resource_dependency.autoSuggestEndpoint: An endpoint from the stockDataAPI that returns matching stock suggestions based on partial input strings.

function: Provide auto-suggested stock matches dynamically as the user types in the search bar.
static_description: No visible element until typing begins. Dropdown list appears beneath the search bar containing suggested stock entries formatted as [Ticker Symbol] – [Company Name].

interaction_and_states.description: Selecting a suggestion populates the search bar with the full stock identifier and triggers navigation or display of stock details page.
Highlights individual suggestion item with light navy background.

resource_dependency.stockDetailsSchema: Database table 'stocks' with fields: id (primary key), ticker_symbol (string), company_name (string), current_price (float), last_updated (datetime).
resource_dependency.stockDataAPI: A real-time stock data API providing company profiles, current prices, and metadata.

function: Display essential stock information such as company name, ticker symbol, and current price upon selection.
static_description: A card-style container with navy header displaying 'Stock Overview'. Below it shows three rows: Company Name, Ticker Symbol, Current Price — each labeled clearly with values aligned right.

interaction_and_states.description: Fetches latest stock data via stockDataAPI and displays within respective labels. Updates last_updated timestamp visually if needed.

resource_dependency.chartingLibrary: Integration with a charting library like Chart.js or TradingView Lightweight Charts.
resource_dependency.historicalPricesEndpoint: API endpoint returning time-series pricing data for selected stocks.
resource_dependency.marketTrendColors: #001F54 for rising trends, #C00000 for falling trends

function: Visualize market trend data through interactive charts showing historical price movements.
static_description: Interactive line chart rendered using chartingLibrary inside a bordered navy panel. X-axis shows dates, Y-axis shows price values. Default view spans last 30 days.

interaction_and_states.description: Clicking on different intervals (e.g., 7D, 1M, 6M, 1Y) reloads chart with updated timeframe data fetched from historicalPricesEndpoint.
Displays tooltip showing exact date and closing price at hovered point.

resource_dependency.financialDataSchema: Database table 'financials' with fields: stock_id (foreign key), revenue (float), net_income (float), pe_ratio (float), eps (float), roe (float), debt_to_equity (float), quarter_end_date (date).
resource_dependency.financialDataAPI: API endpoint delivering quarterly and annual financial statements and calculated metrics.

function: Present comprehensive financial data including revenue, earnings, and key performance ratios.
static_description: Tabular layout under 'Financial Summary' heading. Columns include Metric (Revenue, Net Income, P/E Ratio, etc.) and Value. All text in navy font on white background.

interaction_and_states.description: Switch between yearly aggregated vs quarterly breakdown views of financial data retrieved from financialDataAPI.

function: Allow users to choose preferred report format before generation.
static_description: Three horizontally aligned buttons labeled PDF, Word, HTML with corresponding icons (formatSelectorIcons). One option pre-selected by default.

interaction_and_states.description: Selects the desired format visually and stores choice internally for use during report generation.

function: Enable customization of report contents by selecting relevant sections.
static_description: Vertical checklist with checkboxes next to each section title (contentSectionOptions). All boxes checked by default. Background remains white with navy text.

interaction_and_states.description: Toggles checkmark state of checkbox and adds/removes section from selected content set used for report generation.

resource_dependency.reportGeneratorService: Backend microservice responsible for compiling selected data into specified format using templates.
resource_dependency.templateEngine: Templating engine (e.g., Jinja2 or Handlebars) to merge dynamic data with predefined layouts.

function: Automatically compile and generate stock reports based on user selections.
static_description: Hidden button labeled 'Generate Report' which becomes active once format and content are chosen. Upon click, progress indicator briefly appears while processing.

interaction_and_states.description: Invokes reportGeneratorService passing selected format and content sections. Generates file stored at reportStoragePath and initiates download.

function: Provide export functionality for saving generated reports in various file formats.
static_description: Dropdown menu accessible via downloadIcon next to generated report preview. Lists available exportFormats.

interaction_and_states.description: Opens dropdown menu listing supported formats. Clicking one starts download process for that version.

resource_dependency.uiComponentLibrary: Pre-built UI components styled according to palette.

function: Maintain consistent styling throughout the application with a white background and navy-colored components.
static_description: All pages utilize solid white background (#FFFFFF). Interactive elements, headers, and controls rendered in navy blue (#001F54). Buttons, cards, and form inputs follow this theme.

resource_dependency.websocketConnection: WebSocket connection established with real-time stock data feed provider.
resource_dependency.stockUpdateInterval: Every 30 seconds or triggered by significant price changes

function: Keep displayed stock data synchronized with live market updates.
static_description: No visible indicators unless value changes occur. Numerical values update automatically without manual refresh.

interaction_and_states.description: Relative percentage change shown alongside current price with directional arrow (up/down) colored green/red respectively.

resource_dependency.newsAndSentimentAPI: API aggregating recent articles and sentiment scores about given stocks.

function: Display curated news snippets and sentiment analysis related to searched stocks.
static_description: Collapsible panel titled 'Latest News & Market Sentiment'. Contains scrollable list of article titles, publication sources, and sentiment score badges colored per sentimentColorMapping.

interaction_and_states.description: Opens linked article in new browser tab.
Shows/hides full list of news items and sentiment summary.

resource_dependency.comparisonToolSchema: Database schema storing peer group mappings and comparative KPIs per stock.
resource_dependency.peerGroupDataAPI: API endpoint returning industry averages and top competitors’ metrics.

function: Facilitate side-by-side comparisons of stocks against industry benchmarks.
static_description: Side-scrollable horizontal bar chart comparing selected stock’s KPIs (P/E ratio, EPS growth, etc.) with average and top performers in sector.

interaction_and_states.description: Adds another stock entry to the comparison visualization by triggering peerGroupDataAPI fetch and re-rendering chart.
Deletes selected comparison row and recalculates visualization accordingly.

resource_dependency.userReportHistorySchema: Table 'user_report_history' with fields: user_id (FK), report_id (PK), created_at (timestamp), format_used (enum), content_sections (JSON), status (enum: pending/completed/expired)
resource_dependency.savedTemplatesSchema: Table 'report_templates' with fields: template_id (PK), user_id (FK), name (string), settings (JSON)

function: Store previously generated reports and allow reuse of favorite configurations.
static_description: Dedicated 'My Reports' section accessible from main navigation. Displays paginated list of past reports with creation timestamps and formats used.

interaction_and_states.description: Loads previous configuration into editor allowing regeneration or modification prior to re-export.
Persists current format/content choices to savedTemplatesSchema enabling quick future access.

resource_dependency.responsiveDesignFramework: CSS media queries and mobile-first grid system ensuring cross-device compatibility.

function: Ensure optimal viewing experience across desktop, tablet, and smartphone interfaces.
static_description: Layout adjusts fluidly across screen sizes. Navigation transforms into hamburger menu on smaller screens. Font sizes scale appropriately.

interaction_and_states.description: Adapts layout using responsiveDesignFramework breakpoints. Rearranges columns to stacked blocks where necessary.
Allows horizontal swipping through multi-page report previews or comparison charts on touch-enabled devices.
